reviewText: Everyone could watch! One episode I had to rewind to see if they actually named the character what they did. Names were interesting. As for the stories, very good! But a little boring. Very calm and relaxing anime to say the least. The light novels were the best, I haven't had the chance to read the manga yet.

This is a 6 episode anime series. Yes its short with 6 episodes but it is good because any more would just ruin it. The story is about a Shikigami (japanise for the angel of death) that feels for the living and will grant that last "message" or "face to face" before takeing the soul on to the other place. No fan service or anything wierd but an EXCELLENT story. This is a good family series to own. Price is good too :)
its came in good condition with no problem it is an excellent anime and it was amazing to watch and see
Despite it being the shortest series I have ever owned, the design on the cover is beautiful and I think it will be a good series no matter what
Its a pretty good movie, but its not reall self explainatory...it could've been longer, maybe I could've gotton into it a lil more!!!
